CustomField.formula: OR( AND( (Bis_ID__c > 0) ,NOT(ISBLANK(First_Run_Date__c)) ,ISBLANK(Lost_Date__c) ,( TEXT(Type) != "Lost Client") ,( TEXT(Type) != "HRS Client (Only)") ,( TEXT(Type) != "HR Solutions NPR Client")) ,(TEXT(Type) = "HROi Client") ,(TEXT(Type) = "Oasis Client") )
CustomField.label: Current Client?
